name: Blank Space (itch) (Glipso)
description:
Travel through the vast abyss in this mini parkour experience.  Over 38 levels of travelling through the void with soft classical music accompanying you. 

Controls:

WASD- Movement

Mouse- Look around

Spacebar- Jump

Zoom- Scroll wheel

Dash- Shift

Credits:

Player controller from Will_Dev:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdl9pPY5egaL3Vtei39yiiA 

This is my first game, so please leave comments on what I can improve.
